text: Johnny Saxton (July 4, 1930, Newark, New Jersey - October 4, 2008) was an American boxer who won the welterweight championship. ==Life== ===Career=== Saxton beat Kid Gavilan in 1954 to become the welterweight champion. The lost the title the following year to Tony DeMarco. In 1956, he won the title again by beating Carmen Basilio, but lost the title in a rematch with Basilio later in the year. He retired in 1958. ==Other websites== * Boxing record Category:2008 deaths Category:American boxers Category:Sportspeople from Newark, New Jersey Category:1930 births
title: Johnny Saxton
